home.title: Translate Subtitles in Multiple Languages
home.description: Upload your subtitle files and get accurate translations in minutes. No manual work needed.
home.queueNote: Note: Your files will be processed in order of submission. You'll be able to track your position in the queue.
legal.translationDisclaimer: This is the official English version of this document. All other translations are AI-generated and provided for convenience only. Only the English version is legally binding.
features.title: Why Choose Our Subtitle Translator
features.subtitle: Fast, accurate, and easy-to-use subtitle translation for all your needs
features.multipleLanguages.title: Multiple Languages
features.multipleLanguages.description: Translate your subtitles into 5 different languages with high accuracy and natural phrasing.
features.fastProcessing.title: Fast Processing
features.fastProcessing.description: Get your translated subtitles quickly with our efficient processing system.
features.highQuality.title: High Quality
features.highQuality.description: Our translation engine ensures accurate and contextually appropriate translations.
features.easyDownload.title: Easy Download
features.easyDownload.description: Download all your translated subtitle files in a convenient zip package.
features.privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
features.privacyFirst.description: Your subtitle files are processed securely and deleted after 7 days.
features.pricing.title: Flexible Pricing
features.pricing.description: Pay only for what you need with our credit-based system.
footer.description: Automatically add subtitles to your videos in multiple languages.

footer.legal.title: Legal
howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Translate your subtitle files in just a few simple steps
howItWorks.step1.title: Upload Your Files
howItWorks.step1.description: Drag and drop your subtitle files or browse to select them. We support .srt format.
howItWorks.step2.title: Select Languages
howItWorks.step2.description: Choose the languages you want your subtitles translated into. You can select multiple languages at once.
howItWorks.step3.title: Track Progress
howItWorks.step3.description: Monitor your translation status with a unique link. You'll see your position in the queue and when processing begins.
howItWorks.step4.title: Download Results
howItWorks.step4.description: Once processing is complete, download a zip file containing all your translated subtitle files. Files are available for 7 days.
testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what content creators are saying about Titro.
testimonials.testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.testimonial1.content: Titro has been a game-changer for my YouTube channel. I can now reach a global audience without spending hours on manual subtitling.
testimonials.testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.testimonial2.content: The accuracy of the subtitles is impressive. I've tried other tools, but Titro consistently delivers the best results for my documentary films.
testimonials.testimonial3.name: Elena Rodriguez
testimonials.testimonial3.content: Our marketing videos now reach audiences in multiple countries thanks to Titro. The process is so simple, and the results are fantastic.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro.title: Introduction
privacy.intro.content: This Privacy Policy outlines how we manage information in connection with your use of our subtitle translation service. Our goal is to provide a seamless, multilingual experience while respecting your privacy and minimizing data collection. This policy explains what limited information we do use, how it is handled, and your rights as a user of the platform.
privacy.cookies.title: Cookies and Language Preferences
privacy.cookies.content: We use a minimal number of essential cookies strictly to remember your selected language and interface preferences. These cookies ensure that your experience on the site remains consistent as you navigate between pages and return to the service. No cookies are used for tracking, advertising, or analytics purposes. You may disable cookies through your browser settings, but doing so may affect how the service performs, especially in maintaining your language settings.
privacy.thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content
privacy.thirdParty.content: While our platform is self-contained, it may occasionally include links to third-party websites—for example, external documentation or open-source resources. These sites operate independently, and we are not responsible for their content, data policies, or practices. We recommend that users review the privacy policies of any third-party services they choose to visit through external links.
privacy.changes.title: Changes to This Policy
privacy.changes.content: We may revise this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to the service or in compliance requirements. All updates will be clearly posted on this page with the most recent revision date. Continuing to use the service after changes are published constitutes your agreement to the updated policy.
privacy.contact.title: Contact
privacy.contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, or if you need clarification on how we handle data and cookies, please reach out to us through our official support channels. We're committed to providing transparent and respectful communication.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro.title: Welcome
terms.intro.content: Welcome to our subtitle translation platform. By accessing or using this service, you agree to be bound by the following Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.
terms.acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.acceptance.content: By using this website, you confirm that you understand and agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
terms.service.title: 2. Description of the Service
terms.service.content: This service provides tools for translating and localizing subtitles and other user-provided text. It is designed to support multiple languages through a user-friendly interface, with language switching and internationalization powered by react-intl.
terms.responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
terms.responsibilities.content: You agree to use the platform in a lawful and respectful manner. You must not upload or use content that is illegal, harmful, or infringes on the rights of others. You are responsible for any content you submit for translation or display through the platform.
terms.intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
terms.intellectualProperty.content: All original content, design, and functionality of the site are the property of the platform owner. Any user-submitted content remains the property of the original author. By submitting content, you grant us a non-exclusive license to process and display that content within the context of the translation features.
terms.warranty.title: 5. No Warranty
terms.warranty.content: The service is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranties of any kind. While we aim for accuracy and stability, we make no guarantees that translations are error-free or that the service will be uninterrupted or secure.
terms.liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
terms.liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any damages or losses arising from your use of the platform. This includes indirect or consequential damages, lost profits, or lost data.
terms.modifications.title: 7. Modifications to the Terms
terms.modifications.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. When we do, the new version will be posted on this page with the updated effective date. Continued use of the service means you accept the updated terms.
terms.governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
terms.governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction], without regard to conflict of law principles.
terms.contact.title: 9. Contact
terms.contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our official support channel or contact form.
